description: Mello, a character present in the anime and manga versions, was an orphan who grew up with Near and Matt in Wammy`s House, Watari`s shelter for "gifted" children. Like Near and Matt, Mello was one of the candidates to become L`s successor. Similar to L`s fondness for sweets, he is often seen eating bars of chocolate. Although Mello is quite intelligent, he often lets his emotions get the better of him.
name: Mello
